posts.post_content: Looking to buy either or both in any condition. Would consider other exhibits of the same players from the period. My budget is around $5k. Please let me know your price and post pictures if you have any you would sell! Thank you!

1910 PC796 Christy Mathewson - Sepia Postcards PSA 1 (EX+ look)This card is very similar in characteristics to the other PC796, the Big Train, in this auction. It is an excellent looking card with all of the eye appeal of a five. It has the two tiny pinholes that will keep the price affordable for more collectors. A truly great value and super pose of arguably one of the best pitchers of all time. Great investment potential because of the value vs the eye appeal.[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20220714/0c84e914c0c55bfeee0c023ffa040e78.jpg[/IMG]

Sent from my TECNO LA7 using Tapatalk

SO what's the deal here?  You show a 2.5 and have taken the description from the auction for a different card?

Thats not your card, it belongs to a friend of mine and is eBay.
Got my Big Train PC796 but still looking for Matty!
